scripts.text:
WITH
SQ_pif_02_stage AS (
	SELECT
		pif_02_stage_id,
		logical_flag,
		extract_date,
		as_of_date,
		record_count,
		source_system_id,
		inf_action,
		inf_timestamp,
		pif_id,
		pif_symbol,
		pif_policy_number,
		pif_module,
		pif_master_co_number_a,
		pif_location_a,
		pif_amend_number,
		pif_eff_yr_a,
		pif_eff_mo_a,
		pif_eff_da_a,
		pif_exp_yr_a,
		pif_exp_mo_a,
		pif_exp_da_a,
		pif_installment_term_a,
		pif_number_installments_a,
		pif_risk_state_prov,
		pif_company_number,
		pif_branch,
		pif_profit_center,
		pif_full_agency_number,
		pif_ent_yr_a,
		pif_ent_mo_a,
		pif_ent_da_a,
		pif_total_agen_prem,
		pif_line_business,
		pif_issue_code,
		pif_company_line,
		pif_pay_service_code,
		pif_mode_code,
		pif_audit_code,
		pif_kind_code,
		pif_variation_code,
		pif_sort_name,
		pif_producer_code,
		pif_review_code,
		pif_mvr_report_year,
		pif_risk_grade_guide,
		pif_risk_grade_undwr,
		pif_renewal_code,
		pif_reason_amended,
		pif_renew_pay_code,
		pif_renew_mode_code,
		pif_renew_policy_symbol,
		pif_renew_policy_number,
		pif_original_incept,
		pif_customer_number,
		wb_endorsement_dec,
		wb_class_of_business,
		pif_guarantee_ind,
		pif_extra_copy,
		wb_renewal_discount,
		wb_inview_indicator,
		pif_occupation,
		pif_zip_5_digit_code,
		pif_address_line_1,
		pif_insured_name_cont,
		pif_address_line_2_b,
		pif_address_line_3,
		pif_address_line_4,
		pif_history_option,
		pif_final_audit_ind,
		pif_excess_claim_ind,
		pif_pms_type_level,
		pif_anniversary_rerate,
		pif_legal_entity,
		pif_reins_process_ind,
		pif_policy_status_on_pif,
		pif_aca_policy_code,
		pif_aca_destination,
		pif_pc_address_area,
		pif_pc_sequence,
		pif_uk_postal_code,
		pif_policy_start_time,
		pif_insured_occupation_code_x,
		pif_dec_change_sw,
		pif_pms_future_use,
		pif_credit_rpt_type,
		pif_nonsmoker_discount,
		pif_aus_outlook_queue,
		pif_upload_audit,
		pif_yr2000_conv_ind,
		pif_zip_ind,
		pif_prgm_id,
		pif_wbc_county,
		pif_sic,
		pif_orig_act_date,
		pif_fn_date,
		pif_cbop_automatic,
		pif_terrorism_risk,
		pif_terrorism_sw,
		pif_target_market_code,
		pif_completed_audit_date,
		pif_umbrella_present_sw,
		pif_nb_edge_ind,
		pif_ren_edge_ind,
		pif_seg_id,
		pif_record_count,
		pif_dec_printed_sw,
		pif_date_time_stamp,
		pif_jj_zip,
		pif_service_center,
		pif_download_ind,
		pif_yr2000_cust_use,
		pif_renewal_safe_record_ctr,
		pif_rec_length_red,
		pif_action_code,
		pif_file_id,
		pif_inrule_error_sw,
		pif_dc_bill_ind
	FROM pif_02_stage
),
EXP_arch_pif_02_stage_daily AS (
	SELECT
	@{pipeline().parameters.WBMI_AUDIT_CONTROL_RUN_ID} AS AUDIT_ID,
	pif_02_stage_id,
	logical_flag,
	extract_date,
	as_of_date,
	record_count,
	source_system_id,
	inf_action,
	inf_timestamp,
	pif_id,
	pif_symbol,
	pif_policy_number,
	pif_module,
	pif_master_co_number_a,
	pif_location_a,
	pif_amend_number,
	pif_eff_yr_a,
	pif_eff_mo_a,
	pif_eff_da_a,
	pif_exp_yr_a,
	pif_exp_mo_a,
	pif_exp_da_a,
	pif_installment_term_a,
	pif_number_installments_a,
	pif_risk_state_prov,
	pif_company_number,
	pif_branch,
	pif_profit_center,
	pif_full_agency_number,
	pif_ent_yr_a,
	pif_ent_mo_a,
	pif_ent_da_a,
	pif_total_agen_prem,
	pif_line_business,
	pif_issue_code,
	pif_company_line,
	pif_pay_service_code,
	pif_mode_code,
	pif_audit_code,
	pif_kind_code,
	pif_variation_code,
	pif_sort_name,
	pif_producer_code,
	pif_review_code,
	pif_mvr_report_year,
	pif_risk_grade_guide,
	pif_risk_grade_undwr,
	pif_renewal_code,
	pif_reason_amended,
	pif_renew_pay_code,
	pif_renew_mode_code,
	pif_renew_policy_symbol,
	pif_renew_policy_number,
	pif_original_incept,
	pif_customer_number,
	wb_endorsement_dec,
	wb_class_of_business,
	pif_guarantee_ind,
	pif_extra_copy,
	wb_renewal_discount,
	wb_inview_indicator,
	pif_occupation,
	pif_zip_5_digit_code,
	pif_address_line_1,
	pif_insured_name_cont,
	pif_address_line_2_b,
	pif_address_line_3,
	pif_address_line_4,
	pif_history_option,
	pif_final_audit_ind,
	pif_excess_claim_ind,
	pif_pms_type_level,
	pif_anniversary_rerate,
	pif_legal_entity,
	pif_reins_process_ind,
	pif_policy_status_on_pif,
	pif_aca_policy_code,
	pif_aca_destination,
	pif_pc_address_area,
	pif_pc_sequence,
	pif_uk_postal_code,
	pif_policy_start_time,
	pif_insured_occupation_code_x,
	pif_dec_change_sw,
	pif_pms_future_use,
	pif_credit_rpt_type,
	pif_nonsmoker_discount,
	pif_aus_outlook_queue,
	pif_upload_audit,
	pif_yr2000_conv_ind,
	pif_zip_ind,
	pif_prgm_id,
	pif_wbc_county,
	pif_sic,
	pif_orig_act_date,
	pif_fn_date,
	pif_cbop_automatic,
	pif_terrorism_risk,
	pif_terrorism_sw,
	pif_target_market_code,
	pif_completed_audit_date,
	pif_umbrella_present_sw,
	pif_nb_edge_ind,
	pif_ren_edge_ind,
	pif_seg_id,
	pif_record_count,
	pif_dec_printed_sw,
	pif_date_time_stamp,
	pif_jj_zip,
	pif_service_center,
	pif_download_ind,
	pif_yr2000_cust_use,
	pif_renewal_safe_record_ctr,
	pif_rec_length_red,
	pif_action_code,
	pif_file_id,
	pif_inrule_error_sw,
	pif_dc_bill_ind
	FROM SQ_pif_02_stage
),
arch_pif_02_stage AS (
	INSERT INTO @{pipeline().parameters.TARGET_TABLE_OWNER}.arch_pif_02_stage
	(pif_02_stage_id, logical_flag, extract_date, as_of_date, record_count, source_system_id, inf_action, inf_timestamp, audit_id, pif_id, pif_symbol, pif_policy_number, pif_module, pif_master_co_number_a, pif_location_a, pif_amend_number, pif_eff_yr_a, pif_eff_mo_a, pif_eff_da_a, pif_exp_yr_a, pif_exp_mo_a, pif_exp_da_a, pif_installment_term_a, pif_number_installments_a, pif_risk_state_prov, pif_company_number, pif_branch, pif_profit_center, pif_full_agency_number, pif_ent_yr_a, pif_ent_mo_a, pif_ent_da_a, pif_total_agen_prem, pif_line_business, pif_issue_code, pif_company_line, pif_pay_service_code, pif_mode_code, pif_audit_code, pif_kind_code, pif_variation_code, pif_sort_name, pif_producer_code, pif_review_code, pif_mvr_report_year, pif_risk_grade_guide, pif_risk_grade_undwr, pif_renewal_code, pif_reason_amended, pif_renew_pay_code, pif_renew_mode_code, pif_renew_policy_symbol, pif_renew_policy_number, pif_original_incept, pif_customer_number, wb_endorsement_dec, wb_class_of_business, pif_guarantee_ind, pif_extra_copy, wb_renewal_discount, wb_inview_indicator, pif_occupation, pif_zip_5_digit_code, pif_address_line_1, pif_insured_name_cont, pif_address_line_2_b, pif_address_line_3, pif_address_line_4, pif_history_option, pif_final_audit_ind, pif_excess_claim_ind, pif_pms_type_level, pif_anniversary_rerate, pif_legal_entity, pif_reins_process_ind, pif_policy_status_on_pif, pif_aca_policy_code, pif_aca_destination, pif_pc_address_area, pif_pc_sequence, pif_uk_postal_code, pif_policy_start_time, pif_insured_occupation_code_x, pif_dec_change_sw, pif_pms_future_use, pif_credit_rpt_type, pif_nonsmoker_discount, pif_aus_outlook_queue, pif_upload_audit, pif_yr2000_conv_ind, pif_zip_ind, pif_prgm_id, pif_wbc_county, pif_sic, pif_orig_act_date, pif_fn_date, pif_cbop_automatic, pif_terrorism_risk, pif_terrorism_sw, pif_target_market_code, pif_completed_audit_date, pif_umbrella_present_sw, pif_nb_edge_ind, pif_ren_edge_ind, pif_seg_id, pif_record_count, pif_dec_printed_sw, pif_date_time_stamp, pif_jj_zip, pif_service_center, pif_download_ind, pif_yr2000_cust_use, pif_renewal_safe_record_ctr, pif_rec_length_red, pif_action_code, pif_file_id, pif_inrule_error_sw, pif_dc_bill_ind)
	SELECT 
	PIF_02_STAGE_ID, 
	LOGICAL_FLAG, 
	EXTRACT_DATE, 
	AS_OF_DATE, 
	RECORD_COUNT, 
	SOURCE_SYSTEM_ID, 
	INF_ACTION, 
	INF_TIMESTAMP, 
	AUDIT_ID AS AUDIT_ID, 
	PIF_ID, 
	PIF_SYMBOL, 
	PIF_POLICY_NUMBER, 
	PIF_MODULE, 
	PIF_MASTER_CO_NUMBER_A, 
	PIF_LOCATION_A, 
	PIF_AMEND_NUMBER, 
	PIF_EFF_YR_A, 
	PIF_EFF_MO_A, 
	PIF_EFF_DA_A, 
	PIF_EXP_YR_A, 
	PIF_EXP_MO_A, 
	PIF_EXP_DA_A, 
	PIF_INSTALLMENT_TERM_A, 
	PIF_NUMBER_INSTALLMENTS_A, 
	PIF_RISK_STATE_PROV, 
	PIF_COMPANY_NUMBER, 
	PIF_BRANCH, 
	PIF_PROFIT_CENTER, 
	PIF_FULL_AGENCY_NUMBER, 
	PIF_ENT_YR_A, 
	PIF_ENT_MO_A, 
	PIF_ENT_DA_A, 
	PIF_TOTAL_AGEN_PREM, 
	PIF_LINE_BUSINESS, 
	PIF_ISSUE_CODE, 
	PIF_COMPANY_LINE, 
	PIF_PAY_SERVICE_CODE, 
	PIF_MODE_CODE, 
	PIF_AUDIT_CODE, 
	PIF_KIND_CODE, 
	PIF_VARIATION_CODE, 
	PIF_SORT_NAME, 
	PIF_PRODUCER_CODE, 
	PIF_REVIEW_CODE, 
	PIF_MVR_REPORT_YEAR, 
	PIF_RISK_GRADE_GUIDE, 
	PIF_RISK_GRADE_UNDWR, 
	PIF_RENEWAL_CODE, 
	PIF_REASON_AMENDED, 
	PIF_RENEW_PAY_CODE, 
	PIF_RENEW_MODE_CODE, 
	PIF_RENEW_POLICY_SYMBOL, 
	PIF_RENEW_POLICY_NUMBER, 
	PIF_ORIGINAL_INCEPT, 
	PIF_CUSTOMER_NUMBER, 
	WB_ENDORSEMENT_DEC, 
	WB_CLASS_OF_BUSINESS, 
	PIF_GUARANTEE_IND, 
	PIF_EXTRA_COPY, 
	WB_RENEWAL_DISCOUNT, 
	WB_INVIEW_INDICATOR, 
	PIF_OCCUPATION, 
	PIF_ZIP_5_DIGIT_CODE, 
	PIF_ADDRESS_LINE_1, 
	PIF_INSURED_NAME_CONT, 
	PIF_ADDRESS_LINE_2_B, 
	PIF_ADDRESS_LINE_3, 
	PIF_ADDRESS_LINE_4, 
	PIF_HISTORY_OPTION, 
	PIF_FINAL_AUDIT_IND, 
	PIF_EXCESS_CLAIM_IND, 
	PIF_PMS_TYPE_LEVEL, 
	PIF_ANNIVERSARY_RERATE, 
	PIF_LEGAL_ENTITY, 
	PIF_REINS_PROCESS_IND, 
	PIF_POLICY_STATUS_ON_PIF, 
	PIF_ACA_POLICY_CODE, 
	PIF_ACA_DESTINATION, 
	PIF_PC_ADDRESS_AREA, 
	PIF_PC_SEQUENCE, 
	PIF_UK_POSTAL_CODE, 
	PIF_POLICY_START_TIME, 
	PIF_INSURED_OCCUPATION_CODE_X, 
	PIF_DEC_CHANGE_SW, 
	PIF_PMS_FUTURE_USE, 
	PIF_CREDIT_RPT_TYPE, 
	PIF_NONSMOKER_DISCOUNT, 
	PIF_AUS_OUTLOOK_QUEUE, 
	PIF_UPLOAD_AUDIT, 
	PIF_YR2000_CONV_IND, 
	PIF_ZIP_IND, 
	PIF_PRGM_ID, 
	PIF_WBC_COUNTY, 
	PIF_SIC, 
	PIF_ORIG_ACT_DATE, 
	PIF_FN_DATE, 
	PIF_CBOP_AUTOMATIC, 
	PIF_TERRORISM_RISK, 
	PIF_TERRORISM_SW, 
	PIF_TARGET_MARKET_CODE, 
	PIF_COMPLETED_AUDIT_DATE, 
	PIF_UMBRELLA_PRESENT_SW, 
	PIF_NB_EDGE_IND, 
	PIF_REN_EDGE_IND, 
	PIF_SEG_ID, 
	PIF_RECORD_COUNT, 
	PIF_DEC_PRINTED_SW, 
	PIF_DATE_TIME_STAMP, 
	PIF_JJ_ZIP, 
	PIF_SERVICE_CENTER, 
	PIF_DOWNLOAD_IND, 
	PIF_YR2000_CUST_USE, 
	PIF_RENEWAL_SAFE_RECORD_CTR, 
	PIF_REC_LENGTH_RED, 
	PIF_ACTION_CODE, 
	PIF_FILE_ID, 
	PIF_INRULE_ERROR_SW, 
	PIF_DC_BILL_IND
	FROM EXP_arch_pif_02_stage_daily
),
